MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to safely transfer customers onto a new mains cable near to Pitcox Lodge substation following a underground cable fault previously and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:26 AM on Tuesday, 15 December 2020.
